pdhp157:2: malo vaṇṇassa kosajjaṁ pramādo rakkhatāṁ malo ।।
pdhp158:1: malo istiye duccaritaṁ maccheraṁ dadatāṁ malo ।
pdhp158:2: malo pāpāni kaṁmāṇi assiṁ loke paramhi ca ।।
pdhp159:1: tato malataraṁ brūmi avijjā maraṇaṁ malaṁ ।
pdhp159:2: ete male prahattāna niṁmalā caratha bhikkhavo ।।
pdhp160:1: ayasā tu malo samuṭṭhito tato uṭṭhāya tam eva khādati ।
pdhp160:2: em eva vidhūnacāriyaṁ sakāni kaṁmāṇi nayanti doggatiṁ ।।
pdhp161:1: pāṇḍupalāśo ca dāni si yamapuruṣā pi ca te upaṭṭhitā ।
pdhp161:2: uyyogamukhe ca tiṣṭhasi pātheyaṁ pi ca te na vijjati ।।
pdhp162:1: uyyamassa ghaṭassa āttanā kaṁmāro rajataṁ va niddhame ।
pdhp166:1: supaśśaṁ vajjaṁ aṁñesaṁ āttano puna duddaśaṁ ।
pdhp166:2: paresām iha vajjāni uppunāti yathā busaṁ ।
pdhp166:3: āttano puna chādeti kalim va kṛtavāṁ śaṭho ।।
pdhp167:2: yaṁ ve hitaṁ ca sādhuñ ca taṁ ve paramadukkaraṁ ।।
pdhp168:2: yāni hitāni sādhūni tāni kurvvanti paṇḍitā ।।
pdhp172:1: sārañ ca sārato ññāttā asārañ ca asārato ।
